description:
Nothing lasts and everything changes form. Except for cringy, embarrassing memories from years ago. Those will stay with you forever.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Shogyou Mujou / 21 Gram no Kachi / Twilight
The Impermanence of All Things / The Value of 21 Grams / Twilight
諸行無情 / 21グラムの価値 / トワイライト
